title: When Writing Becomes the Interface
excerpt: The share of human thought expressed through writing has risen from ancient scripts to the digital age. With tools like ChatGPT, this shift may accelerate, making written language the primary bridge between humans and intelligent systems.

title: Beyond the Linear Chat
excerpt: I keep noticing how difficult it is to find, reference, or organise past conversations in ChatGPT. It’s powerful for thinking but weak for retrieval, still trapped in a linear chat paradigm that limits its potential as a true knowledge base.

title: From Shazam to the AI Growth Bet
excerpt: Shazam was among the first products built around AI from day one, capturing what was to come. Today’s wave sees business leaders betting on AI for growth rather than efficiency—whether that delivers new revenue or just sharper optimization remains to be seen.

title: Hidden Patterns in the Latest Y Combinator Startups
excerpt: After reviewing 400 YC startups, I spotted clear patterns in workflow tools and agentic systems, and one idea stood out—making petty-crime prosecution economically viable.
